sentence.Network_en: Several of the gunmen arrested after the event were Rwandan.
sentence.Network_cn: 事件过后,好几名卢旺达武装人员被逮捕.

sentence.Network_en: Assistant Secretary for State for African Affairs Jendayi Frazer will also have talks with Rwandan officials.
sentence.Network_cn: 国务院非洲事务助理国务卿延达伊·弗雷泽还将跟卢旺达官员举行会谈.

sentence.Network_en: It was closed in 1997 during the Rwandan civil war, in which some 800,000 people died.
sentence.Network_cn: 1997年,卢旺达爆发内战, 80万人死亡,公园也因战乱关闭.

list.abs: yet several rwandan military officers , and a few opposition leaders , have died mysterious deaths ; other senior figures have been jailed on charges of historical revisionism or sedition .然而，一些卢旺达军官和几位反对派领袖神秘死亡；其它的高级官员因遭到历史修正主义和煽动叛乱的指控而被监禁。

means.word_mean: 1. a native or inhabitant of Rwanda
